Class TreeComplete

extends java.lang.Object

Constructor Summary
TreeComplete(java.lang.String treeFileFolder, java.lang.String tokenFileFolder, java.lang.String outFolder)
          Reads in a folder of files containing syntactic trees and produces a similar file where the indeces are replaced with tokens
 
Method Summary
 void createOutputFolder()
          creates the output folder if it does not already exist
 void extractTokens(java.lang.String tokLine)
          Extracts the tokens from a line in a tokenised file and stores them in a HashMap in the format [tokenIndex,Token>]
The tokenised file is part of the GALE Phase 4 Arabic Parallel Aligned Treebank Part 1 Version 1.1 (LDC2009E82) For Arabic, the token is the unvocalized Buckwalter form of the word
 java.lang.String findReplacement(java.lang.String tag)

Constructor Detail

TreeComplete

public TreeComplete(java.lang.String treeFileFolder,
                    java.lang.String tokenFileFolder,
                    java.lang.String outFolder)
Reads in a folder of files containing syntactic trees and produces a similar file where the indeces are replaced with tokens

Parameters:
treeFileFolder - the folder containing syntactic trees
tokenFileFolder - the folder containing the tokenised input
outFolder - the output folder where the new complete trees will be stored

findReplacement

public java.lang.String findReplacement(java.lang.String tag)
Checks whether the tag has to be replaced in order to make it compliant with the Stanford parser output

Parameters:
tag -
Returns:
the replacement tag if tag needs to be replaced, or tag if no changes are necessary

extractTokens

public void extractTokens(java.lang.String tokLine)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Extracts the tokens from a line in a tokenised file and stores them in a HashMap in the format [tokenIndex,Token>]
The tokenised file is part of the GALE Phase 4 Arabic Parallel Aligned Treebank Part 1 Version 1.1 (LDC2009E82) For Arabic, the token is the unvocalized Buckwalter form of the word

Parameters:
tokLine - the input tokenised line
Throws:
java.io.IOException

createOutputFolder

public void createOutputFolder()
                        throws java.io.IOException
creates the output folder if it does not already exist

Throws:
java.io.IOException

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
